list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a mark left on the skin or within body tissue where a wound, burn, or sore has not healed completely and fibrous connective tissue has developed.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: a faint scar ran the length of his left cheek
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: một vết sẹo mờ nhạt chạy chiều dài của má trái

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a steep high cliff or rock outcrop, especially of limestone.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: high limestone scars bordered the road
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Sẹo đá vôi cao bao quanh đường

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: mark with a scar or scars.
